mapper.update:
UPDATE customer_condition
user_id = #{userId},
condition_pool_id = #{conditionPoolId},
platfrom_condition_id = #{platfromConditionId},
menu_code = #{menuCode},
menu_name = #{menuName},
page_name = #{pageName},
condition_value = #{conditionValue},
condition_name = #{conditionName},
defualt_condition = #{defualtCondition},
view_alias_name = #{viewAliasName},
layout_sort = #{layoutSort},
active = #{active},
platfrom_active = #{platfromActive},
is_dft = #{isDft},
condition_type = #{conditionType},
platform_id = #{platformId},
data_type = #{dataType},
group_name = #{groupName},
tbody_value = #{tbodyValue},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
